fields.description:
*Assessment*

While verifying EUCA-10231 - using a non-'eucalyptus', non-'admin' user that has the following IAM access policy:
{code}
cfn-euca10231
{
  "Statement": [
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1419017169361",
      "Action": [
        "cloudformation:CreateStack",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStacks",
        "cloudformation:GetTemplate",
        "cloudformation:ListStacks"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    },
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1419017345024",
      "Action": [
        "ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress",
        "ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress",
        "ec2:CreateKeyPair",
        "ec2:CreateSecurityGroup",
        "ec2:DescribeInstances",
        "ec2:DescribeKeyPairs",
        "ec2:DescribeSecurityGroups",
        "ec2:RunInstances"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    }
  ]
}
{code}
User was not able to create a security group.  
{code}
# euform-create-stack --template-file cfn-ubuntu-docker.json --parameter "UbuntuImageId=emi-c883ed00;UserKeyPair=tessai" DockerStack --region tessai-group1@group1
arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/DockerStack/6804e262-0bdd-4b40-a5e6-84c87a6a0c0f

# euform-describe-stacks --region tessai-group1@group1
STACK	DockerStack	ROLLBACK_FAILED	The following resource(s) failed to delete: [DockerSecurityGroup].	Cloudformation Example => Run instance with userdata in security group	2014-12-19T20:20:31.264Z

# euform-describe-stack-events DockerStack --region admin-hspencer@group1
EVENT	DockerStack	e360e387-83c9-4bfa-accd-d32b0c878bc4	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	DockerStack	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/DockerStack/6804e262-0bdd-4b40-a5e6-84c87a6a0c0f	2014-12-19T20:26:08.437Z	ROLLBACK_FAILED	The following resource(s) failed to delete: [DockerSecurityGroup].
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerSecurityGroup-DELETE_FAILED-1419020766826	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	DockerSecurityGroup	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-GEU4NUTN6VZCT	2014-12-19T20:26:06.826Z	DELETE_FAILED	Failed to send message DeleteSecurityGroupType to service ComputeInternal because: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{ComputeInternal.component}. Message payload is of type: DeleteSecurityGroupType
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerSecurityGroup-DELETE_IN_PROGRESS-1419020467600	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	DockerSecurityGroup	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-GEU4NUTN6VZCT	2014-12-19T20:21:07.600Z	DELETE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	d094ee78-993c-4845-b16a-8d8e70e9685e	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	DockerStack	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/DockerStack/6804e262-0bdd-4b40-a5e6-84c87a6a0c0f	2014-12-19T20:21:06.036Z	ROLLBACK_IN_PROGRESS	Create stack failed.  Rollback requested by user.
EVENT	DockerStack	59f21e05-473f-41d4-8505-3ae5433c8461	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	DockerStack	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/DockerStack/6804e262-0bdd-4b40-a5e6-84c87a6a0c0f	2014-12-19T20:20:34.291Z	CREATE_FAILED	The following resource(s) failed to create: [DockerSecurityGroup].
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerSecurityGroup-CREATE_FAILED-1419020433468	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	DockerSecurityGroup	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-GEU4NUTN6VZCT	2014-12-19T20:20:33.468Z	CREATE_FAILED	You are not authorized to perform this operation.
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerSecurityGroup-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419020433037	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	DockerSecurityGroup	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-GEU4NUTN6VZCT	2014-12-19T20:20:33.037Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerSecurityGroup-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419020432383	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	DockerSecurityGroup		2014-12-19T20:20:32.383Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	2c8e185d-7e08-4d47-bc95-9973fd2908ef	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	DockerStack	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/DockerStack/6804e262-0bdd-4b40-a5e6-84c87a6a0c0f	2014-12-19T20:20:31.666Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated
{code}
However, user was able to use euca-create-group and euca-authorize to create and authorize rules in a security group.
{code}
# euca-create-group tessai-test -d "Tessai Testing Group" --region tessai-group1@group1
GROUP	sg-d6479885	tessai-test	Tessai Testing Group

# euca-authorize -P tcp -p ssh tessai-test --region tessai-group1@group1
GROUP	tessai-test
PERMISSION	tessai-test	ALLOWS	tcp	22	22	FROM	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0

# euca-describe-groups --region tessai-group1@group1
GROUP	sg-b9c803cd	617513010345	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-GEU4NUTN6VZCT	Security Group with Ingress Rule for DockerInstance
GROUP	sg-b9bf658a	617513010345	default	default group
GROUP	sg-d6479885	617513010345	tessai-test	Tessai Testing Group
PERMISSION	617513010345	tessai-test	ALLOWS	tcp	22	22	FROM	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	ingress
{code}

*Pertinent Information*

IAM access policy was applied to group which contains user as a member.
{code}
# euare-grouplistusers -g Testers --region admin-hspencer@group1
arn:aws:iam::617513010345:group/Testers
   users
   arn:aws:iam::617513010345:user/tessai

# euare-grouplistpolicies -g Testers -v --region admin-hspencer@group1
cfn-euca10231
{
  "Statement": [
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1419017169361",
      "Action": [
        "cloudformation:CreateStack",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStacks",
        "cloudformation:GetTemplate",
        "cloudformation:ListStacks"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    },
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1419017345024",
      "Action": [
        "ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress",
        "ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress",
        "ec2:CreateKeyPair",
        "ec2:CreateSecurityGroup",
        "ec2:DescribeInstances",
        "ec2:DescribeKeyPairs",
        "ec2:DescribeSecurityGroups",
        "ec2:RunInstances"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    }
  ]
}
{code}

Its understood that deleting the group will fail because the user had no permission to do so.

* EMI used - [Ubuntu Cloud Image 15.04 (Vivid Veret)|http://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/vivid/current/vivid-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img]
fields.summary: Creating Security Group with Cloudformation Fails for non-admin User

comments.body: Cloudformation Template used in this issue.
[~hspencer], please try adding permission for the user to create tags (ec2:CreateTags)

[~sjones],

I added it to the IAM access policy and everything worked just fine. 
{code}
# euare-grouplistpolicies -g Testers -v --region admin-hspencer@group1
cfn-euca10257
{
  "Statement": [
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1419017169361",
      "Action": [
        "cloudformation:CreateStack",
        "cloudformation:DeleteStack",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStackEvents",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStackResource",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStackResources",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStacks",
        "cloudformation:GetTemplate",
        "cloudformation:ListStacks",
        "cloudformation:ListStackResources",
        "cloudformation:ValidateTemplate"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    },
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1419017345024",
      "Action": [
        "ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress",
        "ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress",
        "ec2:CreateKeyPair",
        "ec2:DeleteKeyPair",
        "ec2:TerminateInstances",
        "ec2:DeleteSecurityGroup",
        "ec2:CreateSecurityGroup",
        "ec2:DescribeInstances",
        "ec2:DescribeKeyPairs",
        "ec2:CreateTags",
        "ec2:DescribeSecurityGroups",
        "ec2:RunInstances"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    }
  ]
}
{code}
{code}
# euform-create-stack --template-file cfn-ubuntu-docker.json --parameter "UbuntuImageId=emi-c883ed00;UserKeyPair=tessai" DockerStack --region tessai-group1@group1
arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/DockerStack/ab95336c-57f1-4c7b-9438-f5bdd67527eb

# euform-describe-stacks --region tessai-group1@group1
STACK	DockerStack	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Cloudformation Example => Run instance with userdata in security group	2014-12-24T16:25:41.693Z
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-811d3722
OUTPUT	AZ	two
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.111.52.92
{code}
{code}
 euform-describe-stack-events DockerStack --region tessai-group1@group1
EVENT	DockerStack	bdaff12a-7bcf-4ee6-8373-1894142070e6	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	DockerStack	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/DockerStack/ab95336c-57f1-4c7b-9438-f5bdd67527eb	2014-12-24T16:26:50.171Z	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerInstance-CREATE_COMPLETE-1419438408746	AWS::EC2::Instance	DockerInstance	i-811d3722	2014-12-24T16:26:48.746Z	CREATE_COMPLETE
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerInstance-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419438408068	AWS::EC2::Instance	DockerInstance	i-811d3722	2014-12-24T16:26:48.068Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerInstance-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419438407421	AWS::EC2::Instance	DockerInstance	i-811d3722	2014-12-24T16:26:47.421Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerInstance-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419438406667	AWS::EC2::Instance	DockerInstance	i-811d3722	2014-12-24T16:26:46.667Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerInstance-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419438405810	AWS::EC2::Instance	DockerInstance	i-811d3722	2014-12-24T16:26:45.810Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerInstance-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419438349061	AWS::EC2::Instance	DockerInstance	i-811d3722	2014-12-24T16:25:49.061Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerInstance-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419438347065	AWS::EC2::Instance	DockerInstance		2014-12-24T16:25:47.065Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerSecurityGroup-CREATE_COMPLETE-1419438346177	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	DockerSecurityGroup	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-O8XAX922YXFX5	2014-12-24T16:25:46.177Z	CREATE_COMPLETE
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerSecurityGroup-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419438345775	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	DockerSecurityGroup	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-O8XAX922YXFX5	2014-12-24T16:25:45.775Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerSecurityGroup-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419438345346	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	DockerSecurityGroup	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-O8XAX922YXFX5	2014-12-24T16:25:45.346Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerSecurityGroup-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419438344636	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	DockerSecurityGroup	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-O8XAX922YXFX5	2014-12-24T16:25:44.636Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerSecurityGroup-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419438343815	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	DockerSecurityGroup	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-O8XAX922YXFX5	2014-12-24T16:25:43.815Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	DockerSecurityGroup-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1419438342930	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	DockerSecurityGroup		2014-12-24T16:25:42.930Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT	DockerStack	3a244c2d-b886-41bf-9d33-98a02878a9c4	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	DockerStack	arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/DockerStack/ab95336c-57f1-4c7b-9438-f5bdd67527eb	2014-12-24T16:25:42.177Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated
{code}
Is this a bug that we need add "ec2:CreateTags" when there isn't a tag in the Cloudformation template?  I ask this because I used the same template on AWS without having 'ec2:CreateTags' and it worked just fine.
[~hspencer], yes it is a bug if we require permissions that AWS/CF does not. I assume the security group in your AWS testing was still tagged with the cloudformation service tags.

Fixed as part of a tagging solution.  Should be able to create security group with EC2:CreateSecurityGroup permission now as a non-admin user.  Requires EC2:CreateTags to create any tag via the "Tag": property or --tag field in the euform-create-stack command.  This should also now be the case for any other EC2 command.  Requires EC2:Create<Foo>, and in the case of Instances, EC2:Describe<Foos> but not EC2:CreateTags.

I am able to start an security groups with a non-admin user and no EC2:CreateTags permission defined in the user policy
{code}
[b-16:~/mike]euform-create-stack -p UbuntuImageId=emi-af2ec552 -p UserKeyPair=mike --template-file  securityGroup.json s1
arn:aws:cloudformation::408908251600:stack/s1/8485ab30-9352-41ae-b0b4-0bcc3f3fc50c
[b-16:~/mike]euform-describe-stacks
STACK	s1	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated	Cloudformation Example => Run instance with userdata in security group		2015-01-17T00:40:52.498Z
[b-16:~/mike]euform-describe-stacks
STACK	s1	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Cloudformation Example => Run instance with userdata in security group	{'member': {'OutputKey': 'PublicIP', 'OutputValue': '10.111.101.87'}}2015-01-17T00:40:52.498Z
{code)
